After failing in its hunt for Smurfs in New York , Gargamel ( Hank Azaria ) left for Paris and there became a success , being considered the greatest magician in the world . However , behind the sold-out shows at the Opera is making a plan to capture the little blue beings . For both the wizard creates two danadinhos , Vexy (voiced by Christina Ricci ) and Hackus ( voice JB Smoove ) , to help in their plans . Gargamel manages to create a new tunnel to the Smurf village , where Vexy travels and kidnaps Smurfette (voiced by Katy Perry ) . The idea is that it reveals the secret of the magic formula that made ceased to be a danadinha to become a smurf , something that only she and Papa Smurf (voiced by Jonathan Winters ) have knowledge. Not long before Papa Smurf organize a new expedition to the real world in order to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of Gargamel .
